qas.question: What four main health problems do the Malian people currently have?

answers.text: poverty, malnutrition, and inadequate hygiene and sanitation

qas.question: How does Malian Health and development rank globally?

answers.text: among the worst in the world

qas.question: As of 2012 50.3 years is considered the Malian peoples averages of what statistic?
In 2000 what percentage of the population had access to safe drinking water?
In 2000 roughly how much of the population had access to sanitation services?

plausible_answers.text: challenges related to poverty, malnutrition, and inadequate hygiene and sanitation.

qas.question: What health challenges has Mali largely overcome?
Mali's what now rank among the best in the world?
What was life expectancy estimated to be in 2000?
What percentage of the population had safe drinking water in 2012?
